    • Method Detail

      • getThreshold

        public static String getThreshold​(ArrayList<double[]> Y,
                                  weka.core.Instances D,
                                  String top)
                           throws Exception
        GetThreshold - Get a threshold from a Threshold OPtion string 'top'.
        Parameters:
        Y - label space; for calculating a threshold with PCut
        D - training data; for calculating a threshold with PCut
        top - Threshold OPtion (either "PCut1", "PCutL" or a real value e.g. "0.5" or L real values e.g. "[0.1, 0.2, 0.8]" for L = 3
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getMLStats

        public static HashMap<String,Object> getMLStats​(double[][] Rpred,
                                                int[][] Y,
                                                String t,
                                                String vop)
        GetMLStats - Given predictions and corresponding true values and a threshold string, retreive statistics.
        Parameters:
        Rpred - predictions (may be real-valued confidences)
        Y - corresponding true values
        t - a threshold string, e.g. "0.387"
        vop - the verbosity option, e.g. "5"
        Returns:
        the evaluation statistics

      • getMLStats

        public static HashMap<String,Object> getMLStats​(double[][] Rpred,
                                                int[][] Y,
                                                double[] t,
                                                String vop)
        GetMLStats - Given predictions and corresponding true values and a threshold string, retreive statistics.
        Parameters:
        Rpred - predictions (may be double-valued confidences in the multi-label case)
        Y - corresponding true values
        t - a vector of thresholds, e.g. [0.1,0.1,0.1] or [0.1,0.5,0.4,0.001]
        Returns:
        the evaluation statistics

      • getMTStats

        public static HashMap<String,Object> getMTStats​(double[][] Rpred,
                                                int[][] Y,
                                                String vop)
        GetMTStats - Given multi-target predictions and corresponding true values, retreive evaluation statistics.
        Parameters:
        Rpred - predictions
        Y - corresponding true values
        Returns:
        the evaluation statistics

      • combinePredictions

        public static Result combinePredictions​(Result[] folds)
        Combine Predictions - Combine together various results (for example, from cross-validation) into one, simply by appending predictions and true values together, and averaging together their 'vals'.
        Parameters:
        folds - an array of Results
        Returns:
        a combined Result

      • averageResults

        @Deprecated
public static Result averageResults​(Result[] folds)
        Deprecated. 
        AverageResults - Create a Result with the average of an array of Results by taking the average +/- standand deviation.
        Parameters:
        folds - array of Results (e.g., from CV-validation)
        Returns:
        A result reporting the average of these folds.

      • main

        public static void main​(String[] args)
        Main - can use this function for writing tests during development.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
